name: Sling Fight 3D
description:
Epic fight for exclusive devices!

Sling your bros to the store battlefield to fight for the newly released plasma TV or Playstation. Watch out for holes and obstacles.
Manage to bear away the newest devices from the hands of other buyers. Or if you're lucky from the store shelf directly.

- Enjoy destroying crowds of opponents with powerful slingshots.
- Use the best route to exit so you don’t lose your loot
- Find your strategy to beat more foes, slingshot your fighters in the best way.
- Protect your bro while he carries the prey
- Gather lots of limited and exclusive devices

Do you think you can gather all these hot devices? Download the game and try your luck today!

And be careful your opponent also want to possess these cool things
